website_summaries.verdict: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition takes everything we liked about vanilla Injustice and adds more character, outfits, and slightly better visual fidelity. If you plan on getting a PS4 and like fighting games, this Ultimate Edition is a very solid pick up.
cons: Unblockable environmental attacks may prove troublesome

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun, mortal kombat with dc characters.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game. Mortal Kombat is one of my all time favorite fighting games and this shares studios (and Scorpion!) so it's practically the same experience. Great fluid gameplay and solid fighting mechanics. The super moves are hit and miss with some characters having very visually appealing and over the top scenes play out while others have simple boring supermoves that seem like they were added in 10 minutes before the publishing deadline. This game may also represent the only time in history where Aquaman doesn't completely suck - in fact I see him as overpowered. Well played.
customer_reviews.author: TimH

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Injustice: Gods Among Us is a great fighting game that you will love. I am almost finished with the story mode of the game and the story is very good. This version has some additional content and it only makes the game even stronger. These player vs. player fighting games usually do not have a good story but this one has a pretty compelling story. The story within the game is similar to some of the storylines within the comics. The graphics within the game are great and most importantly the fighting mechanics are solid as well. If you like fighting game you will love this one. I would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Ricz5020

customer_reviews.title: This story is not our Superman is
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking about getting this game back when it was released in PS3. Waited and waited and now I have it. Witness the Injustice story played out from the comics to cinematic gameplay. See what if situation like you have never seen before. Superman has lost his mind. Killed Joker and dominated the human race to his iron will. Now Batman and the Resistance must rally and fight the regime of Jerk Superman.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's fun, the story was amusing. Some of the minigames were silly and felt tedious and tacked on though. I mostly got this because I don't have a PS3 anymore, and this came with all the DLC, so why not? The game lags an awful lot despite being a port. It actuallybotherd me a lot how much it lagged considering it's on a much more powerful system than the original. But, if you're a huge DC fan, you should enjoy the game. that's the primary reason I wanted this game. AS a fighting game, it's decent. Not much to say about it from what others already have. Better suited to casuals and just a party game.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: good singleplayer game*offline game mode reviewed only*
customer_reviews.text: hey I aint a fighting game fan but I love comic books, and injustice is a good game to play if you love comics. The characters and their moves are for each characters are authentic for the character from batman ad his counter moves to superman and his special moves, each character has their movies and their own fighting style. The story is good but short but the star missions extend things a little a lot and they can also be used as good training for the story and multiplayer. I have not played multiplayer yet but if it is anything like the offline mode it is good
customer_reviews.author: R. Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: start to choose
customer_reviews.text: a game that brings as much heat to the DC world as does the comics they are told in, the game brings a lot to the table and a much deeper plot that makes the player debate on being a light hero or become a dark hero
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game for fans of the fights.
customer_reviews.text: This product meets all expectations that I needed. I like the state as arrival at their destination. Brand new. I recommend this game for its excellent story, graphics, sound and content of violence, excellent number of fighters. The movement of the fighters in the ring and different combos are excellent. You should definitely play it. RATING 100 points.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicio

customer_reviews.title: Ok game
customer_reviews.text: Great story line, great graphics but it's just lagging something I can't put my finger on. My other half beat the game in 2 days of on and off playing. Now that the game is beaten, it will most likely go to game stop and join their collection. We are both in our 40's and were not overly impressed with the game being a PS4 ultimate edition. We expected more. There wasn't a whole lof of improvement from the PS3 edition in our eyes. I personally would recommend someone to rent the game then buy it and that goes for all games. Good luck and happy gaming to all! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jo Reviews

customer_reviews.title: The only fighting game to play in 2018
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game. The unlockable features and extra DLC are amazingly cool, the fighting controls are pretty basic and easy to pick up. Featuring amazing renditions of a slew of great DC characters and more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Best

customer_reviews.title: Good,Fun filled fight-fest!!Easy to get into*
customer_reviews.text: I have this game on 360 as well&only bought it a 2nd time because it was $13 on Amazon last in early May&my cousin kept pestering me so he could pummel me online on his Ps4 lol.But it is a good game very easy to pick up.And its also made by the Mortal Kombat crew,so you kno its got that nice "MK"feel to it with no fatalities of course!Get it if you like good fighter games....
customer_reviews.author: Mahor!

customer_reviews.title: this is the best fighter game period.
customer_reviews.text: If you liked marvel vs capcom, dc vs mortal kombat,etc. Then be prepared to be rocked because those games look like trash compared to this,the supermoves rock, the roster rocks,if i could say one bad thing it would be no darkseid really?sequels in the works and aquaman is to be respected again after you get stabbed alot,extra skins rocked and i really appreciated the storyline, play this game for the first time,and youll be saying heaven is a place on earth on my freakin couch,come on batman vs superman movie,we cant handle a flop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gameplay for Justice League fans
customer_reviews.text: The gameplay is excellent. After that Mortal Kombat versus DC Universe game. Basically Mortal Kombat makers messed with DC Universe a bit trying to make them look bad with this game. The makers of Mortal Kombat made this game. But the gameplay is great. I recommend this game for Justice League comic fans. Also I recommend DC Universe online for Justice League fans. It's for PS4. You just download the free to play version and buy extra content to unlock the full DC Universe online game.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the gift

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Graphics , intriguing storyline
customer_reviews.text: The visuals for this game are incredibly outdated. It looks like they were not enhanced for the next gen of systems , but instead copied and pasted over from the PS3. Cutscenes are choppy and their lack of detail really make you feel like you're playing something horribly outdated in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: HishamAC

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Action
customer_reviews.text: Great commentary from characters and fight combinations. This is based around the DC Comics as you can chose, from Batman, The Flash, Wonder Woman, Joker, Harley Quinn, Green Arrow, Nightwing, Superman and lots other popular characters. If you have "PlayStaion Plus" then you can go online and find people to play agents which is great when you don't have friends around.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... sold out they only had Xbox this game is awesome just like mortal kombat good character No problem good ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm been trying get this game ever since came out but they were sold out they only had Xbox this game is awesome just like mortal kombat good character No problem good game story mode is OK can't wait part 2 comes out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a worthy DC fighting game
customer_reviews.text: After the underwhelming Mortal Kombat vs DC Universe, Injustice is just what DC needed. Marvel has had great success with the Marvel vs Capcom series, and now DC has joined them with this excellent fighter. The story mode was great, and the broad array of iconic characters will keep me entertained for weeks learning moves and honing my skills. This is a truly great game and I'm looking forward to the inevitable sequel!
customer_reviews.author: Craig P

customer_reviews.title: One of the best fighting games ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was an AWESOME game. Never got old! Worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: For my wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a mothers day gift but ended up giving it to her early. She loves it and was very happy with the game.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fun Co-op Play.
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward fun fighting game with a good array of characters to play with. The interactivity of the environments is a good touch, and story mode is fun, but the best time comes in local co-op so if you have someone else to sit on the couch to play with let the trash talk begin and play some beat-em up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Injustice: Ultimate edition
customer_reviews.text: I love it. No other game beats it except Injustice 2.

customer_reviews.title: Game runs and looks great on the PS4
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I expected. Game runs and looks great on the PS4, especially Wonder Woman. Unfortunately some of the costumes that I thought would be available were not. The WB costumes, Batman Forever costume and Green Arrow costumes were not available from the start.

customer_reviews.text: Its mortal combat like. Graphics are amazing and the selection of characters is good. The special moves combos are a bit akward compared to mortal combat in my opinion. Overall well done.

customer_reviews.title: Injustice PS4
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game. Graphics are awesome and the sound is good. I enjoy Battle mode the most. This is a fun fighting game. My favorite hero is Catwoman. She is very cool. I like hero mode best. Transitions are very cool. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: RJ the Great Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 [Every DC Fan should buy this game]
customer_reviews.text: Story: In a different universe, Superman killed the Joker because of what he did to Lois Lane and his baby. This causes him to go little insane and begin to dictate the whole world. Batman, seeing how he's slowly becoming his own monster, has to go get help from a different world. Gameplay: If you play any Mortal Kombat games, you shouldn't have a hard time. Since this is the Ultimate Edition, I think everyone should know how the gameplay works. Obviously, this game has all the DLC. Overall: For what it's worth, why not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: The Notorious Tran

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gamepay. Story line is ok
customer_reviews.text: Fun Gamepay. Story line is ok. Acting is meh for me. I honestly bought this because I want to get into the New Injustice. For the story alone, I recommend getting this game if the sequel is in your, "to do list".

customer_reviews.title: So far has been a great arcade fighting game.

customer_reviews.title: MK Heroes/Villains Edition
customer_reviews.text: Great game with included DLC. You really can't go wrong for the price. It is a Mortal Kombat modeled game with a DC universe superhero and villain twist. What's not fun about that? Great game. Great price. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Fun from a non-fighting gamer
